net.sourceforge.aglets.util
Class AgletsTranslator

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.aglets.util.AgletsTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class AgletsTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

This class represnts a "translator" object for anything in the platform (even the platform itself). Internally, this class uses a ResourceBundle object to provide the translation of contents.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net 04/set/07

Constructor Detail

AgletsTranslator

private AgletsTranslator(java.lang.String localeBaseName,
                         java.util.Locale currentLocale)
Builds this translator object with the specified resource name and locale.

Parameters:
localeBaseName - the resource name (e.g., the name of properties file)
currentLocale - the locale for which the translation is required

AgletsTranslator

private AgletsTranslator(java.lang.Class<?> callerClass,
                         java.util.Locale currentLocale)
Builds this translator object with the specified class object and locale.

Parameters:
class - the class for which the resource bundle is requested
currentLocale - the locale for which the translation is required
Method Detail

translate

public java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String text)
Translates a specific part of text, without arguments (i.e., you have to handle escape characters outside this method). If the bundle has not been created or if the text has no way to be translated (e.g., it is the string ""), then the original string will be returned.

Parameters:
text - the string to translate
Returns:
the translated string

getLocale

public final java.util.Locale getLocale()
Provides the locale this object is working with, or null if none.

Returns:
the locale for the translations.

getResourceBaseName

public final java.lang.String getResourceBaseName()
Gets the basename of this translator.

Returns:
the basename that has been used to initialize this object.

getKeys

public java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String> getKeys()
Provides the keys of this translator object.

Returns:
the enumeration of the keys.

getInstance

public static AgletsTranslator getInstance(java.lang.String localeBaseName,
                                           java.util.Locale currentLocale)
Provides an implementation of the AgletsTranslator. If the translator has already been loaded, the previous one is returned.

Parameters:
localeBaseName - the base name for the translation
currentLocale - the locale
Returns:
the aglets translator

Provides an implementation of the AgletsTranslator. If the translator has already been loaded, the previous one is returned.

Returns:
